name: Pinot Noir
description: A light-bodied red wine with flavors of red fruits like cherry and raspberry, balanced with earthy undertones.

name: Sangiovese
description: A medium-bodied red wine with bright acidity and flavors of red plum, cherry, and savory herbs.

name: Tempranillo
description: A Spanish red wine with flavors of plum, leather, and tomato, often aged in oak for added complexity.

name: Nero d'Avola
description: A full-bodied Sicilian red wine with bold flavors of black cherry, plum, and chocolate.

name: Grenache
description: A fruity red wine with flavors of strawberry, plum, and hints of herbs and spices.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: A full-bodied red wine with dark fruit flavors of blackberry and black currant, complemented by notes of oak and tobacco.

name: Shiraz
description: A rich and bold red wine with spicy, peppery flavors and dark fruit notes like blackberry and plum.

name: Nebbiolo
description: An Italian red wine known for its strong tannins and flavors of cherry, rose, and leather.

name: Riesling
description: A light and aromatic white wine with flavors of green apple, citrus, and stone fruits. It can range from dry to sweet.

name: Semillon
description: A rich and full-bodied white wine with flavors of lemon, apple, and honey. Often used in dessert wines.

name: Sauvignon Blanc
description: A crisp and refreshing white wine with flavors of green apple, lime, and grassy notes.

name: Vermentino
description: A light-bodied white wine with flavors of citrus, pear, and almond, often with a saline finish.

name: Gruner Veltliner
description: An Austrian white wine known for its zesty acidity and flavors of lime, green apple, and white pepper.

name: Pinot Gris
description: A light and refreshing white wine with flavors of pear, apple, and citrus, often with a subtle spiciness.

name: Fiano
description: A medium-bodied Italian white wine with flavors of honey, nuts, and tropical fruits.

name: Chenin Blanc
description: A versatile white wine with flavors of apple, pear, and honey, ranging from dry to sweet.

name: Viognier
description: A rich and aromatic white wine with flavors of peach, apricot, and floral notes.

name: Chardonnay
description: A full-bodied white wine with flavors of apple, pear, and oak, often with buttery notes from malolactic fermentation.

name: Pilsner
description: A light and crisp beer with a golden color and clean finish, offering subtle hop bitterness.

name: Session Ale
description: A low-alcohol beer with a balanced flavor profile, making it refreshing and easy to drink.

name: Pale Ale
description: A hoppy beer with a mild bitterness and flavors of citrus and pine.

name: Sour Beer
description: A tart and tangy beer with fruity or citrus notes, offering a refreshing and palate-cleansing experience.

name: Lager
description: A light and crisp beer with a clean and refreshing finish, perfect for warm weather.

name: IPA
description: A hop-forward beer with bold citrus, pine, and floral flavors, often with a bitter finish.

name: Brown Ale
description: A malty beer with flavors of caramel, toffee, and nuts, offering a smooth and slightly sweet taste.

name: Porter
description: A dark beer with flavors of chocolate, coffee, and roasted malt, offering a rich and smooth experience.

name: Imperial Stout
description: A strong and rich beer with flavors of dark chocolate, coffee, and roasted malt, perfect for cold weather.

name: Barley Wine
description: A high-alcohol beer with rich malt flavors of caramel, toffee, and dried fruit.

name: Glenmorangie Original 10 Year Old
description: A light and floral Scotch whisky with hints of citrus and vanilla, offering a refreshing sip.

name: Maker’s Mark
description: A smooth and sweet wheated bourbon featuring caramel, vanilla, and fruity notes.

name: Jameson Irish Whiskey
description: Crisp and smooth, with notes of vanilla, citrus, and light spice, ideal for mixed drinks.

name: Buffalo Trace
description: A balanced bourbon with vanilla, caramel, and fruity hints, ideal for whiskey cocktails.

name: Lagavulin 16 Year Old
description: A bold Islay Scotch with intense peat smoke, rich sweetness, and a long, warming finish—perfect for cold nights.

name: GlenDronach 18 Year Old
description: Sherry-cask-aged Scotch with rich dark fruit flavors, chocolate, and warming spices, ideal for winter sipping.

name: Ardbeg Uigeadail
description: A smoky, powerful Islay whisky with layers of dark chocolate, dried fruit, and intense peat, offering warmth and depth.

name: Redbreast 15 Year Old
description: A sherried Irish whiskey with rich, spicy, and fruity notes of nuts, raisins, and baking spices, perfect for cold evenings.

name: Macallan Sherry Oak 12 Year
description: A classic sherried Scotch with rich flavors of dried fruit, vanilla, and warm spices, making it a winter staple.

name: Elijah Craig Barrel Proof
description: A robust, high-proof bourbon with deep caramel, vanilla, and oak flavors, offering a warming kick for cold weather.

name: Laphroaig 10 Year Old
description: A smoky, medicinal Islay Scotch with bold peat, salty seaweed, and warming spice flavors—great for braving the winter chill.

name: Balvenie DoubleWood 12 Year Old
description: A sweet and malty Scotch with layers of sherry, oak, and honeyed fruit, offering warmth and complexity.

name: Old Forester 1920 Prohibition Style
description: A high-proof bourbon with rich caramel, vanilla, and spice flavors, perfect for a warming winter dram.

name: Highland Park 18 Year Old
description: A complex Scotch with balanced peat, heather honey, dried fruits, and warm spices, offering rich, comforting flavors.
